New Records: Klay Thompson broke the record for most three-pointers in a Mavericks debut with 6
Key Match Events: Klay Thompson's strong performance in the first five minutes of the game
Kyrie Irving's defensive effort on Tre Jones
Naji Marshall's ability to bring up the ball and set up the offense
Luka Doncic's pass to P.J. Washington for a three-pointer
Luka Doncic's pass to Klay Thompson for a three-pointer
The Mavericks hitting 7-of-12 from three in the third quarter
Others: The Mavericks shot poorly in the first half
There were a few too many lazy plays throughout the game
The Mavericks allowed the Spurs to cut 10 points out of a 21-point lead in the garbage time moments of the fourth quarter
